amendment.description: An amendment numbered 58 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to reduce funding for the operation of the Council on Environmental Quality by $2,750,000 to its currently authorized level of $1,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
